cells.data:
1. Merge the doc-updates-for-5x branch into master
  2. Remove Horizontal Volume Control doc from menu
  3. In Customize Player Appearance doc:
    1. Update Controls Visibility section
    2. Update Control bar icon order section
    3. Update instructions to get class names once control bar stays open
  4. Provide access to old customization docs
  5. Remove HLS plugin doc (HLS now part of both HTML5 and Flash tech)
